name: Lucky (QuevDev)
description:
- A short game made in 50 days, for my beloved.

This game does not support saves, as it is meant to be completed in one session. It takes roughly 20 minutes to complete.

I wanted to include an image of the box which the game was delivered in - it was stored in a USB drive.

If you're playing, I hope this little project brings you some fun, and that you enjoy the projects I create in the future!

- Controls

Hit F11 or F4 to switch from full-screen to windowed mode, and vice versa.

Use the arrow keys or WASD to move.

Use SHIFT to run.
